title: Pixel 3 Camera is jumpy, glitchy.
content:
I have noticed that my rear videos my Pixel shoots are jumpy and glitchy. You can hear the lens making a noise when it happens.  I have changed between 4k and 1080, disabled stability and a few other things and it still happens.  It still happens after the March update.

Please see this clip of it.
https://photos.app.goo.gl/CbTkpgbDFweP4XMc9
